structure.unit: Sec. 8-2195. - NEW OR REPLACEMENT REUSE WATER SYSTEMS TO BE FLOOD RESISTANT.

law.catch_line: NEW OR REPLACEMENT REUSE WATER SYSTEMS TO BE FLOOD RESISTANT.
law.text: Any and all new or replacement reuse water supply systems within flood-prone areas shall be designed and constructed to minimize and eliminate discharges from such systems into floodwaters. (Ord. No. 2006-100, ยง1, 9-19-06)
